question: Cardiac enzymes were normal.Diabetes test was negative.Ultrasound showed nothing abnormal.Stress does not seem to cause symptoms.EKG was normal.Symptoms:  LightheadedNumbness in Left HandNumbness in Left FootChest Discomfort (Tightness - No Pain)Sweating (lasted 5 minutes)I realize a blocked artery or PAD may be the cause.  But can all of these symptoms be caused by chronic gas also?  What else may be the cause?I am going for more testing in a few days.-Eric
title: Could it be Gas?
